title: 再有人係你d post講個七十歲阿伯，你咁答佢咪得lo

replies.msg:
We condemn all kind of violence and hope he would be rest in peace. The hk regime and ccp are fully responsible for the death of the old man, for bringing such chaos to HK which leads to numerous deaths of the pro-democracy civilians . They should immediatly take actions to response the 5 demands.

任何野都引番去政府同共產黨就得
唔好係d 共狗開既post回幫佢地推post
殺到埋身先回
呀鬼 你都係講返中文啦
